Detailed Description

ItemEditor is a base class for editors in Component Editor module.

This class should be used as a base class when implementing an element-specific editor. This base class provides means to communicate with ComponentTreeNavigator.

bool ItemEditor::isValid (  )  const [virtual]

Check for the validity of the edited item.

Base class implementation always returns true.

Returns:
True if item is valid.

Reimplemented in APIEditor, BusInterfaceEditor, ChannelEditor, EndpointEditor, FileBuilderEditor, FileEditor, FileSetEditor, GeneralEditor, ModelParameterEditor, OtherClockDriversEditor, ParametersEditor, PortsEditor, SoftwareMappingsEditor, and ViewEditor.

void ItemEditor::removeModel (  )  [virtual]

Remove the edited element from the model.

This function should be used when user wants to remove an element from the component. Base class implementation does nothing.

Reimplemented in APIEditor, BusInterfaceEditor, ChannelEditor, FileEditor, FileSetEditor, and ViewEditor.

bool ItemEditor::confirmEditorChange (  )  [virtual]

Allows/disallows the editor change.

Returns:
True, if this editor can be hidden without consequences. Otherwise false.

void ItemEditor::contentChanged (  )  [signal]

Emitted when the contents of the widget change.

Parameters:
